about.greeting: Hi! I'm Juan (aka JJ, aka Prince) =)
about.bio: I'm a front-end developer with 10+ years of experience crafting user-friendly web experiences for arts & culture, nonprofit, and corporate organizations. Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and tools like Git, Laravel, Tailwind, Alpine, and WordPress. I'm a collaborative problem-solver who approaches complex challenges thoughtfully, turning them into structured, meaningful solutions that balance user needs with business goals.
about.currentFocus: Always learning and growing, I'm currently expanding into React and Node.js to broaden my full-stack skills. I'm positive, adaptable, and supportive â€” ready to bring good vibes and solid experience to a new team!
